testcase.name: US_008 TC_001 Old password can not be used again
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to "http://www.gmibank.com/login" loginpage.................passed And user provides valid username............................................passed And user provides valid password............................................passed And user clicks sign in button..............................................passed Given user clicks to account menu...........................................passed And user clicks to password button to edit..................................passed Then verifies there is old password passord bug.............................passed

testcase.name: US_008 TC_002 new password should have at least 1 "lowercase" to change line1 color of chart color
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to "http://www.gmibank.com/login" loginpage.................passed And user provides valid username............................................passed And user provides valid password............................................passed And user clicks sign in button..............................................passed Given user clicks to account menu...........................................passed And user clicks to password button to edit..................................passed Then enter new seven chars "111111a" and verifies that should be at least one "lowercase" at new password and level chart changes accordingly.passed

testcase.name: US_008 TC_003 new password should have at least 1 "uppercase" to change line1 color of chart color
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to "http://www.gmibank.com/login" loginpage.................passed And user provides valid username............................................passed And user provides valid password............................................passed And user clicks sign in button..............................................passed Given user clicks to account menu...........................................passed And user clicks to password button to edit..................................passed Then enter new seven chars "111111A" and verifies that should be at least one "uppercase" at new password and level chart changes accordingly.passed

testcase.name: US_008 TC_004 new password should have at least 1 "special" to change line1 color of chart color
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to "http://www.gmibank.com/login" loginpage.................passed And user provides valid username............................................passed And user provides valid password............................................passed And user clicks sign in button..............................................passed Given user clicks to account menu...........................................passed And user clicks to password button to edit..................................passed Then enter new seven chars "111111_" and verifies that should be at least one "special" at new password and level chart changes accordingly.passed

testcase.name: US_008 TC_005 new password should have at least 1 "digit" to change line1 color of chart color
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to "http://www.gmibank.com/login" loginpage.................passed And user provides valid username............................................passed And user provides valid password............................................passed And user clicks sign in button..............................................passed Given user clicks to account menu...........................................passed And user clicks to password button to edit..................................passed Then enter new seven chars "aaaaaa1" and verifies that should be at least one "digit" at new password and level chart changes accordingly.passed

testcase.name: US_008 TC_006 New password should have at least 4 chars
